text: Aap dekhen gay kay aftab ba-waqt tuloo unn kay ghaar say dayne janob ko jhuk jata hai aur ba-waqt-e-ghuroob unn kay bayen janib katra jata hai aur woh iss ghaar ki kushada jaga mein hain. Yeh Allah ki nishaniyon mein say hai. Allah Taalaa jiss ki raahbari farmaye woh raah-e-raast per hai aur jissay woh gumraah ker dey na mumkin hai kay aap uss ka koi kaar saaz aur rehnuma paa saken
